attributes.action: UK government pay jsa to the non working person in a non marriage relationship
attributes.additional_details: Why should we punish people who are looking for work. Why should we make a working person be worse off and expect them.to pay for the person in there un married relationship. They are not married no children are involved in the relationship. The working person has to pay for there own business, renting a house aswell as paying for themselves and there partner. This person deserves jsa. this person is actively looking for work. These people don't share funds. UK governement sort it out.
attributes.background: We all know how hard it is to cope with cash when we are in a relationship (not marriage) when one of the couple is working full time and the other isn't.  The non working person should be able to make a single claim for jsa as the couple isn't married the working persons money is there own money.
